### Using `SwitchHosts!` automatic update hosts on Mac
Add an rule:
- name: custom
- type: remote
- url: [https://gitee.com/fliu2476/github-hosts/raw/main/hosts](https://gitee.com/fliu2476/github-hosts/raw/main/hosts)
- auto update: 1 Hour

that's it!
